Home.hero: Client and server application template with ready-made solutions
Home.changelog-text: Be the first to know about new changes and improvements in the finished NexstJS template.
Home.templates-text: Additional templates to the current template.
Home.system-custom: The project contains system and user folders.
Home.system: It is better not to touch the System folders, since everything is necessary for the operation of the client and server applications.
Home.custom: You can already use the Custom folders as you wish. It is intended for your decisions.
